question:
Who among the following are of the view that the managerial techniques and skills of Planning, Organizing, Coordinating and Budgeting are same in both Public and Private Administration?
(a) Henry Fayol 
(b) M.P. Follet
(c) Luther Gulick 
(d) L. Urwick
Select the correct answer from the codes given below.
explanation: Henry Fayol, M.P. Follet, Luther Gulick and L. Urwick are of the view that the managerial techniques and skills of planning, organizing, coordinating and budgeting are same in both Public and Private Administration.
